oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Corticosteroids and glucose in bovine ketosis
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Shpigel, N. H.
Chen, R.
Avidar, Y.
Bogin, E.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: dexamethasone
flumethasone
rapid intravenous infusion
glucose
ketosis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The relative efficacy of dexamethasone and flumethasone alone or in combination with rapid intravenous infusion of glucose was compared in the treatment of ketosis in 127 dairy cows in Isreal. Full article published in Journal of American Veterinary Medical Association (1996) 208, 1702
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1997; 182
